abstract: Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday that Ken Hitchner would succeed David C. Ryan as president for the Asia-Pacific region, excluding Japan.
snippet: Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday that Ken Hitchner would succeed David C. Ryan as president for the Asia-Pacific region, excluding Japan.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday that it would appoint Ken Hitchner, a 22-year veteran of the firm, as president for the Asia-Pacific region, excluding Japan.

headline.main: Goldman Appoints a New President in Asia

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
